name: AssHoleRoids
description:
Assholeroids is a game where you fly a Butt around space shooting poop at my head. I call my floating heads Assholeroids. When you shoot one it screams out and explodes in blood. How fun is that?! Bloody Roids!

The game has 10 unique levels: 8 regular levels and 2 bonus rooms where you shoot planets for extra points. There is a high score board to keep track of how good you are at shooting Assholeroids too!

All the sounds and music are 100% original; even the fart sound when the butt flies around space. If you spin the Butt just right you can make green gas spew out of it too!

I really hope you enjoy my first game Assholeroids. If you do, I would appreciate a small donation to help fund my next game. Or, just tell a friend about my stupid Butt shooting poop space game!

Let me know what you think by Tweeting me @odddustin or commenting below.
